WEATHER FORECAST FOR 23 JANUARY 2025
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 23 January 2025
Showers will occur at times in Uva province and in Ampara, Batticaloa, Matale, Nuwara-Eliya,
Hambantota and Matara districts. Several spells of showers may occur in Northern and North-
Central provinces and in Trincomalee district.

howers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere in the evening or night.
